fedora_file_added: A user added a file to fedora in a project
fedora_file_removed: A user removed a file from fedora in a project
fedora_file_updated: A user updated a file in fedora in a project
fedora_folder_created: A user created a folder in fedora in a project
fedora_folder_selected: A user linked a fedora folder in a project
fedora_node_authorized: A user authorized the fedora addon for a project
fedora_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the fedora addon for a project
fedora_node_deauthorized_no_user: fedora addon for a project deauthorized
